original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says: Terrible trouble is coming to you! It will be worse than any other trouble.
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 이르시되 재앙이로다, 비상한 재앙이로다 볼지어다 그것이 왔도다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Almighty Lord says:
Terrible trouble is coming to you!
It will be worse than any other trouble.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 다른 어떤 재앙보다 더 나쁠 것입니다.
